name: WE CARE SOCIETY
briefDescription: Established in 2004,  and promoted by the Netherlands based entities , WCS, is a “Not for Profit” society headquartered in Bangalore, India with offices in the Netherlands and Uganda.Under its network, WCS has more than 50 NGOs, and 150 farmer groups, SHGs and offer its services, Its Focal Areas are:1. Agriculture & Animal Husbandry2. Environment & Rural Solid Waste Management3. Healthcare, Education, Water & Sanitation, Women & Child Welfare4. Survey
